fields.name: Delete
fields.description: The function to delete the blob

fields.name: EnableAutoTierToHotFromCool
fields.description: This property enables auto tiering of a blob from cool to hot on a blob access. This property requires tierToCool.daysAfterLastAccessTimeGreaterThan.

fields.name: TierToArchive
fields.description: The function to tier blobs to archive storage.

fields.name: TierToCold
fields.description: The function to tier blobs to cold storage.

fields.name: TierToCool
fields.description: The function to tier blobs to cool storage.

fields.name: TierToHot
fields.description: The function to tier blobs to hot storage. This action can only be used with Premium Block Blob Storage Accounts
